page.title: 05A JOB SURVEY
page.content: I have found out the jobs that the mums and dads from the families in our school do. More people have jobs in the town than in the country. Only a few work locally. The local jobs are fruit farming. They are seasonal jobs that mums do such as strawberry, hop & apple picking & potato collecting. For the rest of the year they are unemployed. Most people's dads work away from the village- in the nearest large town on light industry such as steel packing or gas delivering. Some have professional jobs as a college teacher, librarian, youth trainer & two teachers. A few work for large firms as carpenter, caretaker & groundsman. Our most famous father is an entertainer who works an emu puppet and is known all over the world. It seems funny seeing someone on T.V. wandering across the playground.
